p_seccion_1_primero: Through information and inquiry we do we focus on the identity design for Florence Vario - Services fashion- , we think an effective , clean , strong and easy brand recognition . We knew it had to be fun and pointing to a young and daring public.
p_seccion_1_segundo: The design process was based on 3 parameters: sophisticated , funny and emotional . Features we saw reflected in the target audience of the brand. It must be a current and surprising identity.
p_seccion_3_parrafo: Emotional. This is how we begin to generate corporate identity for Florencia Vario , advertising agency specializing in fashion. The brand is aimed at young people who are interested in the world of fashion.
p_seccion_5_parrafo: It was to create a sophisticated , strong, vibrant image full of emotion. Where speed and vertigo are protagonists . The intense colors reinforce this idea of ​​our youth. The diagonals give us that speed and dynamism that we look for the brand. We generate a composition of shapes, colors and spaces that speak for themselves in each of their projects.
